title: Dazzling Diamond Bangles: A Touch of Modern Elegance
materials: meticulously crafted and studded with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting
radiant shine. Gold weight approximately 20 grams per bangle.
features: These exquisitely designed bangles feature a modern aesthetic with a repeating geometric pattern encrusted with sparkling Cubic Zirconia. The design seamlessly blends traditional Indian bangle styles with a contemporary edge, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Secure clasp closure for easy wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white from the CZ stones.
occasions: or any special occasion. Suitable for both traditional Indian attire and modern ensembles. Can be worn for Sangeet
description: These bangles represent a fusion of traditional aesthetics and modern design. The brilliant Cubic Zirconia stones provide a luxurious sparkle at an accessible price point. The secure clasp ensures comfortable and worry-free wear. The Hyderabadi Polish adds an extra layer of durability and radiance, ensuring this piece will be cherished for years to come. This is a unique design not found elsewhere.
